verses.verse: O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>; for thou hast <S%H3782>fallen<s%> by thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

Take <S%H3947><s%> with you <S%H1697>words<s%>, and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H5375>him<s%>, Take away all <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H3947>accept<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%>: so will we <S%H7999>render<s%> as <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> the offering of our <S%H8193>lips<s%>.

Assyria <S%H804><s%> shall not <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H7392>us<s%>; we will not ride upon <S%H5483>horses<s%>; neither will we <S%H559>say<s%> any more to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands<s%>, Ye are our <S%H430>gods<s%>; for in thee the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> findeth <S%H7355>mercy<s%>.
I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> their <S%H4878>backsliding<s%>, I will <S%H157>love<s%> them <S%H5071>freely<s%>; for mine <S%H639>anger<s%> is turned away from <S%H7725>him<s%>.
I will be as the <S%H2919>dew<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; he shall <S%H6524>blossom<s%> as the <S%H7799>lily<s%>, and cast <S%H5221>forth<s%> his <S%H8328>roots<s%> as <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>.
His <S%H3127>branches<s%> shall <S%H3212>spread<s%>, and his <S%H1935>beauty<s%> shall be as the <S%H2132>olive-tree<s%>, and his <S%H7381>smell<s%> as <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>.

They that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%>; they shall <S%H2421>revive<s%> as the <S%H1715>grain<s%>, and <S%H6524>blossom<s%> as the <S%H1612>vine<s%>: the <S%H2143>scent<s%> thereof shall be as the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>.

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall <S%H6091>say<s%>, What have I to do any more with idols? I have <S%H6030>answered<s%>, and will <S%H7789>regard<s%> <S%H7488>him<s%>: I am like a green <S%H1265>fir-tree<s%>; from me is thy <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%>.

Who is <S%H2450>wise<s%>, that he may <S%H995>understand<s%> these <S%H995>things<s%>? prudent, that he may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1870>them<s%>? for the ways of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> are <S%H3477>right<s%>, and the <S%H6662>just<s%> shall <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H6586>them<s%>; but transgressors shall fall <S%H3782>therein<s%>.
